column5: Private room centrally located home in Frisco just off of Main and Preston. Only 2 miles from Toyota Stadium and just minutes from Dallas North Tollway. The new home of the Dallas Cowboys Training Center is 10 minutes away.   I'm located 25 miles from DFW Airport (+/- $40 Uber) and 25 miles from Dallas Love Field (+/- $38 Uber).   Walking distance to Walmart, Chick Fila, and other restaurants. Come see what the Dallas Metroplex has to offer!
column8: Private room centrally located in Frisco!
